title: Lower Limb Overview — Detailed Slides
summary: Regions, bones, joints, and transitions with emphasis on knee mechanics and arterial name changes.
high_yield: Knee is a modified hinge joint allowing rolling, gliding, and rotation
External iliac → femoral (inguinal ligament) → popliteal (adductor hiatus)
pitfalls: Assuming pure hinge at knee without rotation
Forgetting the adductor hiatus transition to popliteal artery

content.stem: Which description best characterizes the knee joint?

choices.text: Saddle joint with two orthogonal axes
Modified hinge with gliding, rolling, and rotation

rationale.correct: Knee functions as a modified hinge with additional rolling, gliding, and rotation.

distractors.A: Hip is ball-and-socket; knee is not.
distractors.B: Saddle joints describe thumb CMC, not knee.
distractors.E: Pivot describes radioulnar and atlantoaxial joints.
